LanguageData.DoTheRitualsYourselves.UI.StartNow.Tip: Starts the ritual immediately. Ignores ritual policy except for participant requirements.
LanguageData.DoTheRitualsYourselves.UI.AutoStart.Tip: Colonists will start the ritual according to its policy.
LanguageData.DoTheRitualsYourselves.UI.RitualPolicy.T: Configure participants and start conditions for the ritual.
LanguageData.DoTheRitualsYourselves.UI.RitualSpot.Tip: Assign a preferred location for the ritual. If none is set, the highest expected quality location will be used.
LanguageData.DoTheRitualsYourselves.UI.StartTooltip: Start the ritual immediately with proper preparation.
LanguageData.DoTheRitualsYourselves.UI.RepeatPenaltyS: The ritual was performed recently, so the quality may be low.
LanguageData.DoTheRitualsYourselves.UI.Policy.Title: Ritual Policy
LanguageData.DoTheRitualsYourselves.UI.Policy.Desc: Create and manage rules for automatic ritual initiation and conditions for participant eligibility.
LanguageData.DoTheRitualsYourselves.UI.Policy.MinPawn: Set the minimum number of participants required to start the ritual.
LanguageData.DoTheRitualsYourselves.UI.Policy.AvgMood: Set the average mood of participants required to start the ritual.
LanguageData.DoTheRitualsYourselves.UI.Policy.Time.Ti: Set the time range during which the ritual may start.
LanguageData.DoTheRitualsYourselves.UI.Policy.InvertT: When enabled, prevents rituals from starting during the specified time range.
LanguageData.DoTheRitualsYourselves.UI.Policy.PawnHea: Set the required health condition of participants eligible for the ritual.
LanguageData.DoTheRitualsYourselves.UI.Policy.PawnMoo: Set the required mood level of participants eligible for the ritual.
LanguageData.DoTheRitualsYourselves.UI.Policy.ExceptR: When enabled, excludes pawns who are resting from the ritual.
LanguageData.DoTheRitualsYourselves.UI.DeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this ritual policy?
